infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs camera access to verify you stay present during focus sessions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs microphone access to record verification videos during focus sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs photo library access to save your session videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs permission to save your session verification videos to your photo library.
